original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1276)@</color>  以 <color=#ccffcc>3</color> 秒為間隔持續對周圍敵方武將發出大範圍的<color=#4cc769>生擒光環</color>，當敵方武將身上累積滿 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 次光環狀態則生擒成功，被生擒成功的敵方武將會在戰場直接撤退並被生擒，當成功生擒兩隻以上的敵方武將後光環就消失。  <color=#4cc769>特殊限制</color> <color=#4cc769>生擒光環</color>一場戰鬥只能使用一次
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1276)@</color> Continue to confront surrounding enemies at intervals of <color=#ccffcc>3</color> Fang military commander sends out a wide range of <color=#4cc769>capture aura</color>. When the enemy military commander accumulates <color=#ccffcc>4</color> sub-halo status, the enemy will be captured alive, and the enemy will be captured successfully. The generals directly retreated on the battlefield and were captured alive. When two or more enemy generals were successfully captured, the halo disappeared. <color=#4cc769>Special restrictions</color> <color=#4cc769>Capture Halo</color> can only be used once in a battle
